title: How to Use Gmail (and Slack and Zoom) Better Than Anyone in Your Office: 19 Easy Shortcuts
description: We’re all expected to be fluent in countless softwares, even if we were born before email existed. These tips and tricks for everything from Chrome to Microsoft Teams will help you power through tasks faster—and actually enjoy your summer.

title: Power Shortage Hits Vietnam, a Production Hub for Apple and Samsung
description: Vietnam is grappling with a severe power shortage, hitting manufacturers that have flocked to the country because they view it as an alternative to China.

title: Meta Reveals Twitter Competitor Planned as Stand-Alone App
description: Separately, Chief Executive Mark Zuckerberg criticizes Apple’s Vision Pro headset, saying Meta has tried to make products affordable.
